name: Cherry Almond Thumbprint Cookies - Almond Pulp Cookies
description: Cherry Almond Thumbprint Cookies - Almond Pulp Cookies. How to use to almond pulp from almond milk with these soft almond thumbprints. Almond Pulp Recipe. Vegan Oil-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 3 Tbsp almond butter  (or other nut butter)
1/2 cup + 2 to 3 Tbsp Spelt flour  (or white wheat flour or other flour of choice)
2 to 3 tsp chia seeds (optional. i add these to absorb any extra moisture from the pulp)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, warm the almond butter and non dairy milk in the microwave and mix until smooth. Or warm the milk on the stove and add to a bowl. Mix in the almond butter until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, warm the almond butter and non dairy milk in the microwave and mix until smooth. Or warm the milk on the stove and add to a bowl. Mix in the almond butter until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add sugar and vanilla and mix in until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add sugar and vanilla and mix in until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the almond pulp and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the almond pulp and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the salt and baking soda in 1/2 cup flour and add to the bowl. Mix in. Add chia seeds and mix in. Add flour a Tbsp at a time till the mixture is a soft dough, not sticky and not too wet. Amount of flour needed will depend on the moisture content of the almond pulp.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the salt and baking soda in 1/2 cup flour and add to the bowl. Mix in. Add chia seeds and mix in. Add flour a Tbsp at a time till the mixture is a soft dough, not sticky and not too wet. Amount of flour needed will depend on the moisture content of the almond pulp.

recipeInstructions.text: Chill for 5 to 10 minutes. Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc.
recipeInstructions.name: Chill for 5 to 10 minutes. Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 350 degrees F / 180ºc.

recipeInstructions.text: Make small balls of the dough and place on parchment lined baking sheet. Press the middle to make a dent.
recipeInstructions.name: Make small balls of the dough and place on parchment lined baking sheet. Press the middle to make a dent.

recipeInstructions.text: Take 2-3 Tbsp of cherry preserves in a small bowl. Mix until it is a bit smooth, Drop 1/2 tsp of the preserves in the dents of the cookies.
recipeInstructions.name: Take 2-3 Tbsp of cherry preserves in a small bowl. Mix until it is a bit smooth, Drop 1/2 tsp of the preserves in the dents of the cookies.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 16 to 17 minutes. Cool completely, serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 16 to 17 minutes. Cool completely, serve.
